: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: I see. Tell me, Condor, do you have any base for your claims? I mean, Flicker was helping you when you fell ill recently.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Condor:

"Sir..."said Condor "I don't know why but I feel that Flicker isn't 
telling all true about him"
